title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repository providing the CLI and server to run Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma and other LLMs locally with a single command.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python library for interacting with the Ollama server; chat, generate, embed, pull and manage models programmatically.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; works in Node, Deno, Bun and browsers via fetch.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration that wraps Ollama models as LLMs and embeddings for chains, agents, RAG, tool-calling, etc.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (ChatGPT-like) with multi-model chats, code highlighting, RAG, admin panel, dark mode.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama offering synchronous, asynchronous and reactive APIs with model management utilities.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem to chat, generate and manage Ollama models from Ruby or Rails apps.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community Rust CLI that wraps the Ollama REST API with coloured output, shell completions and config profiles.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot’s UI for inline suggestions and chat.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support, autoscaling and persistent model cache.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration allowing Ollama models to be used as generators or embedders in Haystack 2.0 pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Official .NET SDK for Ollama with strongly-typed models, dependency-injection helpers and IAsyncEnumerable streaming.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models using slash commands and threads.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up an Ollama service in CI pipelines for testing LLM-powered features.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate providing strongly-typed async bindings to the Ollama REST API with tokio and serde.

title: ollama-nestjs
summary: NestJS module exposing Ollama as an injectable service with Observables and built-in retry logic.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin to run local LLM prompts inside notes for summarisation, translation and brainstorming.

title: ollama-elixir
summary: Official Elixir library wrapping Ollama with GenServer behaviour and streaming via Tesla.

title: ollama-sdks
summary: Meta-repository tracking community SDKs for Go, PHP, Swift, Dart and other languages.

title: awesome-ollama
summary: Curated list of tools, apps, tutorials and integrations in the Ollama ecosystem.
